#ReclaimOurLife

#vaccine roll out success, evidence of safety & efficacy, low #COVID19 risk in schools, increasing harms from closure esp. for the disadvantaged time is of the essence for our kids.

Urgent step 1 on the #Road2Recovery out of #lockdown is to #ReopenSchools
